fullplot: Jessica Stein is a single, straight, successful, journalist, part of a bonded Jewish family living in New York City, who finds herself not as straight as she thought when Jessica meets and begins an intense friendship with career woman Helen Cooper which ultimately leads to romance.
plot: A woman searching for the perfect man instead discovers the perfect woman.
title: Kissing Jessica Stein

tomatoes.consensus: A trite but refreshing and comical spin on nature of love.
